champinon-plancha-soriano.review: The best mushroom in Logroño, without a doubt. Perfectly cooked.

champinon-plancha-blanco-negro.review: Very good mushrooms, although a bit expensive for the size.

foie-manzana-taberna.review: Excellent foie gras, very creative. Impeccable presentation.

foie-manzana-rincon.review: Very good homemade foie, especially the caramelized apple.

pimientos-piquillo-pimientos.review: The best piquillo peppers in Logroño. Excellent garden products.

tortilla-patatas-blanco-negro.review: Modern and creative tortilla, very well presented.

tortilla-patatas-tortilla.review: The best Spanish omelette in Logroño. Juicy and tasty.
